derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from late Latin acuminatus 'pointed', from acuminare 'sharpen to a point', from acuere 'sharpen' (see acute)

means.word_mean: 1. make sharp or acute; taper; make (something) come to a point
1. of a leaf shape; narrowing to a slender point
